titleStmt.title: A True declaration of the last affaires in Ireland shewing te late overthrowes given to the Irish rebels : sent over in two letters / the one from the Earle of Ormond, and the other ftom [sic] Sir Iohn Temple ; red in the House of Parliament, and ordered to bee printed, May foureteene 1642.
titleStmt.author: Ormonde, James Butler, Duke of, 1610-1688.
Temple, John, Sir, 1600-1677.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R.B. for I. Franke, and are to be sould at his shop ...,

notesStmt.note: "Ordered that these letters forthwith bee printed; H. Elssing, Cler. Parl. D. Com."
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
